description: Public Services and Procurement Canada has a requirement, on behalf of the Department of Fisheries and Oceans, for Fiona Storm Damage Reconstruction at Harbour le Cou, Newfoundland and Labrador.
full_summary:
### F6140-230300 - ITT Fiona Storm Damage Reconstruction
#### Contract Information
* Tender Reference: WS4172804738-Doc4227707354
* Amendment Number: 1
* Solicitation Number: WS4172804738
* Publication Date: September 25, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: October 17, 2023, 14:00:00
* Amendment Date: October 13, 2023
* Expected Contract Start Date: None
* Expected Contract End Date: None

#### Contract Details
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is issuing an Invitation to Qualify (ITT) for the Fiona Storm Damage Reconstruction at Harbour Le Cou, Newfoundland and Labrador. The project involves furnishing all necessary plant, labor, equipment, and materials for the reconstruction of storm damage in the specified area.

#### Tendering Process
This is a competitive, selective tendering process, where only qualified suppliers have been invited to submit bids. The selection criterion is based on the lowest price. The estimated contract value falls within the range of $1,000,001 to $5,000,000.

#### End User and Contact Information
The end user for this project is the Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO). The contracting entity is the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC). The contact person for this tender is Adam Beaumaster (SPAC/PSPC). His email address is [adam.beaumaster@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:adam.beaumaster@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca).

#### Terms and Conditions
Bid security is a requirement for this tender. Delivery date is 52 weeks after award of contract.

#### Supporting Documents
None attached.

#### Tender Details
* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* End User Entities: Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO)
* Regions of Opportunity: Newfoundland and Labrador
* Regions of Delivery: Newfoundland and Labrador
* Unspsc Code: 72141200 - Marine construction services
* Estimated Contract Value: $1,000,001 to $5,000,000

Please note that the original text has been rephrased to improve clarity and make it more readable. Some information has been omitted as it was deemed redundant or not essential to the project. The rewritten text follows a more structured format for better understanding.  The word count is kept
